All Days Movers Inc. is a 100% Filipino owned company which has been in the DOMESTIC forwarding business for 8 years. Our seasoned key officers have established good business partnership relationships with major shipping companies to meet our clientele’s service requirements in terms of on-time container availability, delivery commitment and competitive pricing. With a comprehensive network of offices and agencies nationwide, the company is committed to a full door to door service to and from Manila to various destinations in the Philippines.

ABOUT US

COMPANY PROFILE

All Days Movers Inc. is a 100% Filipino owned company which has been in the DOMESTIC forwarding business for 8 years. Our seasoned key officers have established good business partnership relationships with major shipping companies to meet our clientele’s service requirements in terms of on-time container availability, delivery commitment and competitive pricing. With a comprehensive network of offices and agencies nationwide, the company is committed to a full door to door service to and from Manila to various destinations in the Philippines.

With the expertise in handling Full Container Load (FCL), Rolling Cargoes, Earth Moving Machineries and Heavy Equipment Mobilization, the company has broadened its service commitments to RORO, Less Container Load (LCL) and break-bulk services to deliver cargoes bound to remote areas in Luzon, Visayas and Mindanao with reasonable if not shorter transit times at reasonable cost.

OUR MISSION

All Days Movers Inc. believes that “ON TIME DELIVERY” is a key factor in sustaining the customers’ continuous trust and confidence. More to our commitment to service, we make it a point to be MORE VISIBLE at times when there are inevitable hitches and lapses in the process

OUR VISION

To be the ultimate logistics provider which can offer a complete and total logistics solution to the cargo transport industry composed of services ranging from sea freight forwarding, air freight forwarding, international freight forwarding, warehousing, cross-docking, brokerage, trucking and other logistics services.

TRANSPARENCY

TEAMWORK

Our highly dedicated and efficient employees maintain an open line of communication with the different departments of the company and service providers to ensure the continuous flow of operations, from booking to delivery of cargoes for the satisfaction of the customers.

OUT-THE-BOX-SOLUTION

We do not confine ourselves to what we only have, we are not bound by the limitations of company assets in terms of delivering quality service to our clients. We out-source what we don’t have and find other ways to meet our clients’ requirements.

"WE ARE COMMITED, ALL DAYS, ALWAYS"

SERVICES WE OFFERED!

Reliable Shipping Services for Your Business Needs

Our company is committed to meeting client demands by providing dependable shipping services. We have fostered positive relationships with local shipping lines to ensure container availability, timely delivery, and competitive rates. Our door-to-door service from Manila to anywhere in the Philippines is just one of the many solutions we offer. We have also expanded our services to include RORO transportation, which allows for faster transit times to more remote areas in Visayas and Mindanao.
